text:

General:

Alcoholics Anonymous: Meetings, Church of Christ, Anna Nagar; Chennai School, Arunachalam St., Chintadripet; Victory Child Development Centre, Muthalamman Koil St., Selaiyur; Church of Victorious Cross, Jawaharlal Nehru Salai, Ashok Nagar; St. Joseph Church, Cholapuram Rd., Ambattur; St. Sebastian Church, Madhavaram; Ganapathy Sachidananda Ashram Hospital, Velachery; C.S.I. Church, Thiruvottiyur; and Christ Church, Porur, 7 p.m.
title: Chennai today
